public static void CSta(int []numbers)
{
    int length = numbers.length;
    double mean, sum;
    sum = 0.0;
    for(int i = 1; i<length; i++)//i=0
    {
        sum += numbers[i];
    }
    mean = sum / (double) length;
    System.out.println("mean: " + mean);
}

```java
public static void CSta(int []numbers)
{
    int length = numbers.length;
    double mean, sum;
    sum = 0.0;
    for(int i = 1; i<length; i++)//i=0
    {
        sum += numbers[i];
    }
    mean = sum / (double) length;
    System.out.println("mean: " + mean);
}
Test Input:[0,4,5] sum=0+4+5 sum=4+5 mean=3 mean=3
